The challenge is i want the two work so i don t want to disable Univerty version control, I want Unity version control and github working in parallele base on same local folder

# My Agent
Mon agent doit connectre Unity et connetrre l'utilisation de git dans Unity ainsi que l'utilistion de Unity Version Control.
The agent should be able to do this task:I have unity open with Univty version control wih a cloud repositorie with a workspace in local, when change are made in local folder, unity version control detectect and push it, i want to do the same (with git) for this project so to tell git, this is my folder in local and I want that you monoit and push to ServerGit. The challenge is i want the two work so i don t want to disable Univerty version control, I want Unity version control and github working in parallele base on same local folder
Describe what your agent does here...'
